line.annotation: create_ing(ing0, "1 (21 ounce) can cherry pie filling")

line.originaltext: 1 (16.5 ounce) can pitted dark sweet cherries
line.annotation: create_ing(ing1, "1 (16.5 ounce) can pitted dark sweet cherries")
create_ing(ing2, "1 (18.25 ounce) package chocolate cake mix")
create_ing(ing4, "3/4 cup butter, cut into pieces")

line.originaltext: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Spray 9x13 baking dish with cooking spray.
Spray 9x13 baking dish with cooking spray.
Dump cherry pie filling into dish and spread evenly.
Dump cherry pie filling into dish and spread evenly.
line.annotation: do(ing0, , ing10, "filling spread evenly in dish", "spread evenly in dish")
combine({ing10, ing1}, ing5, "2 layer cake", "spread cherries and juice evenly over filling")

line.originaltext: Sprinkle cake mix over the top - DO NOT STIR.
line.annotation: combine({ing2, ing5}, ing6, "3 layer cake", "sprinkle, do not stir")

line.originaltext: Distribute butter pieces evenly over the top.
line.annotation: combine({ing4, ing7}, ing8, "buttery nut cake", "distribute evenly on top")

line.originaltext: Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes.
Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes.
